channel.title: Team Fortress Classic vs Team Fortress 2
channel.description:
Old school or new school?
Personally, I'll take a unique art style, near perfect class balance, and not getting fragged every two seconds over whatever TFC has to offer any day.
Thoughts?

item.title: Team Fortress Classic vs Team Fortress 2
item.dc:creator: Tmaned
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Anyway, these features got removed to make TF2 more accessible to the casual gamer.

What breed of casual are you talking about here? The MW2, Gears of War, Mr.“I play mature games for mature gamers like myself” casuals? I know some of those people, and they’ve never even heard of Half Life, let alone TF2. The Farmville, flash game, ‘hardly knows how a computer works’, your mom casual? Almost none of them even know that you can play games like TF2 and CSS on the computer.

I think the phrase you’re looking for is ‘more accessible to the newbs’. Casual is thrown around way too much, and it’s usually not even casual gamers it’s referring to. It seems like some people use that as a word for ‘people who have fun playing videogames’

I played TFC, and honestly, I don’t give a damn about grenades getting taken away. Also, bunnyhopping can fuck right off, unless it’s a class like the Scout.

Read full topic

item.title: Team Fortress Classic vs Team Fortress 2
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
What did you want to prove with carefully selecting and quoting usual faggotry in Ladies’ club and what makes you believe that my value to humanity can be assessed by looking at my posts?
And why do you think your verbose tl;drs are far more productive and valuable in this place?

Also, name at least ONE reason why I should exhibit my maturity to you anonymous pricks on some internet forum?

Read full topic
item.source: Team Fortress Classic vs Team Fortress 2

item.title: Team Fortress Classic vs Team Fortress 2
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

stop being such a boring nerd.

let’s take a glance at your value to humanity

  • Pics or it didn’t happen.
  • nitpicking at its best.
    Shut the fuck up, no one needs your opinion here.
  • STFU son
  • BAN LLAMA IS STILL SUPERIOR
  • BULLLLLLZEYEEEEEE
  • not he or even she. It.
  • I c wut u did thar
  • WE LIKE HAVING OUR FUN PLEASE DO NOT DISTURB
  • HOMOPHOBIA IS GREAT
  • Fuck out, you are not allowed in this thread.
  • I have no problem.
    But you are clearly butthurt in denial.
  • shit sucks
  • I’m not a coder so I don’t give a bull’s dick.
  • the only one who have a guy is you ahahahaha gay faggot homosexual ahahahahaah.
  • This whole little 11 year old abomination pissed me off since i’ve seen it’s retarded face.
  • BEAVERS
  • And that’s not even a compliment.
  • How unpredictable, eh?
  • loser
  • Ur a fukin son, son
  • Or fapping.
  • yes.
  • SURPRISE FAGGOT DUN DUN DUN
  • OP: Becuz ur a faget
  • PAAAAAAAAAAAAAAUUUUUUUUUUUUL PAUL PAUL PAUL PAUL PAUL
    Fuck yeargh.
  • I go, where I please, and I please, where I go.
  • Deu Sex is always good

I feel sorry if anybody actually tried reading that, but it was necessary to get the point across that ODB’s opinions aren’t worthy of oculi hominum.

He has no qualities of expertise, no respect or compassion for fellow human beings, and apparently no productive activities beyond weightlifting to improve his otherwise-uncalled-for self-esteem. His habit of flinging inane insults at random others appears to be related to that self-esteem issue.

Every once in a while I click on the View Post link by his name, in the hope content or maturity may have seeped in, but to date each click leaves me disappointed in 1990 births.

Read full topic
